title: League of legends will not start up
body: everytime i try and load up league it says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" can someone tell me how to fix this please

replies.body: The kernel error is usually due to a settings issue with your OS that's blocking the patcher from loading.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access and get this resolved.  let me know if you have any questions!
